kohomahari appachchi kanaththa gawin yanakota loku usa ballek issarahin yanawa penawalu.ee dawas wala game soyisa mahaththayage balla nathiwela.game minissuth hoyanawalu hoyanawalu eeth hoyaganna bari wela.appachchi hithuwalu me soyisa mahaththayage nathiwechcha balla wenna athi hithala,appachchith dan hayiyen hayiyen gihin thiyenawa,aaye tika welawak yaddi issarahin giya balla penna nathi wela.aayeth tika durak yaddi me balla passen enawalu.appachchi hithuwalu me issarahen giya balla kohomada dan passen enne kiyala.aaye tika durak yaddi ee balla issarahen indagena innawalu diwath dik karagena.as dekath loku karagena appachchi diha kanna wage balagena innawalu.appachchi ee welawe hithuwalu me nam ballek nam wenna baha.mokak hari adbhutha deyak siduwenawa kiyala hithagena appachchi ehemmama hitagena indala thiyanawa.appachchi sahena welawaka wassema ee widiyata indala.appachchi diha kanna wage balan inna balla balan iddima usa yanawa.ee welawe nam aththatama appachchi godak baya wela indala thiyenne.tika welawak yaddi balla athurudahan una nisa appachchi aaye enna awith, eeth hari sihi kalpanawakin neweyi.ee dawase gedara indala thiyenne ammayi,appachchige ammayi.appachchige amma baluwalu puthata me mokada wela thiyenne.monawada me dodawanne kiyala.ee welawe appachchi ge katin kalupata kisiyam deyak watila thiyenawa.ee witharak neweyi appachchita hondatama una aragena.eedama appachchita nulak dammath kisi suwayayak naha.eeta passe yantharayak damma,pirith kiwwa kisima dekata suwa wela naha.passe thoyilayak natuwa.ethakota thawa kawuruhari kiwwa appachchita asadhyayi.diwath sudu mali wela.dan nam beraganna amaruyi marenna langayi kiwwalu.ethakota api podi loku ayiyayi hin ayiyayi therena wayasaka indala thiyenne.eeta passe aayeth godak ayawa genath,ge mada pirith mandapayak gahala.nawaththanne nathuwa maruwen maruwata pirith kiyala thama marenna giya appachchiwa honda karala thiyenne ithin yaluwane kathawa hondayida kiyala nam danne naha.adupadu thiyenawa athi.ehema thibba nam samawenna.nawatha sathya siduwimak samaga oba hamuwata ena poronduwa samagin danata nawathinnam..
